creator: fedor.malyshkin@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 23113
JMeter (Java Management eXtension) Monitor source path

I implemented recently JMX (Java Management eXtension). I's implemented as Litener - it writes specific log and draws graphs of JVM state (see attachment). Source code patch presented.
P.S.: I have soma failed tests - but I don't know what is the problem, help in fixing it  would be very appreciated.

Thanks for the patch.

However, I'm afraid it is unusable as it stands:
- there are a lot of irrelevant white-space changes to files. These make it very difficult to determine what the changes are.

- there is no useful code; the source files for the JmxJvmStateListener and JmxJvmStateTestElement classes are absent.

If you do wish to proceed, reopen the bug, and attach the source files for the new classes. 

Please ensure that the Java source files have the proper Apache License header, and that the patch files only include the minimum changes necessary.

Thanks.
creator: sebb@apache.org
